reviews.review_text: Great place to enjoy your special moments. Spacious. Good comfortable seating. Service is excellent. The barbeque spread is good in veg and non veg. Even the buffet spread for the main course is good. Wide range of desserts to satisfy your sweet cravings. Our hosts Sadanand and Sandeep were superb hosts.

An Amazing Culinary Experience at Barbeque Nation!

From the moment we stepped in, the atmosphere was vibrant and welcoming. The staff greeted us warmly, setting the tone for an unforgettable dining experience.

The live grill concept was absolutely fantastic, allowing us to customize the flavors to our liking. The variety of starters was mind-blowing, with succulent kebabs, tangy prawns, and tender chicken that were simply irresistible. The quality of the ingredients and the perfectly balanced spices made every bite a delight.

The buffet spread was a food loverâ€™s paradise, offering a wide range of dishes from Indian curries to continental delights. The biryani was aromatic and full of flavor, and the live counters added an exciting touch with freshly prepared dishes.

Special shoutout to Laxman, our server, who went above and beyond to ensure we had a fantastic experience. He was attentive, friendly, and quick to respond to every request, making us feel truly valued as guests.

To top it all off, the dessert section was heavenly! From  brownies to fresh fruit salads and the classic kulfi station, it was the perfect ending to a spectacular meal.

Barbeque Nation exceeded all expectations and is worth every penny. A big thank you to the team, especially Laxman, for making it a memorable experience. Highly recommended!

Some food items  fresh like and sweet are also nice but main source is absolutely  mutton is rubbish not tasty butter chicken was cold and ice cream was melted not properly served and all veg main course was total waste .  I will recommend to  veg people that do not visit Barbeque Goa it's not  valuable at all .. recommend owner  to serve fresh and hot meal customers for not good , it's  bad reviews ....
